message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob.  70/30 seems reasonable considering the inflation disadvantage you have.
Let's flip the script, Alice. You proposed 70/30, now it's my turn. 70/30 it is, but for me this time. I'll be taking the 700,000 and leaving 300,000 for you.  Consider it a counter-offer.
Bob, your sense of humor is appreciated, but this isn't a game of mirroring.  Let's be realistic.  I'm offering 65/35.  Take this deal, because it won't be this good in the next round.
